actions.text: On agreeing to the Gonzalez, Vicente amendment (A002) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 213 - 207 (Roll no. 502).

Roll call votes on amendments in House

description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 117-590 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to promulgate regulations to implement this Act not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security to promulgate regulations to implement this Act not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act.
